name: Mimiel Dash
description:
It's a runner game (demo version) and there is only one stage. The character can attack, jump and air dive. The character will run faster if you hold the attack key/button and she will also float in the air if you hold the jump key/button.

Controls:

KeyboardGamepadJumpAAAttackSX

That's it! It's still a work-in-progress, but feel free to give feedback. Thanks!
